name: Zahed Iqbal
description: In just two months, he has lost 27 lbs and dropped several pants sizes. He went from a size 40-34 ! He says that the best part of losing the weight and gaining his life back has been the energy he has now. Zahed says that he feels better now than he has in his entire life.

name: Jarin Tasnim
description: I have lost 40 pounds. My plan is to continue working towards my goal of losing all of the 45 pounds I gained.  I weighed 245 pounds in January of 2022 and I am now at 204.

name: Jawad Iqbal
description: Being more dedicated to his health has contributed to Kevin losing 65 lbs and feeling so much better. When Kevin is not working on his fitness goals he enjoys riding his Harley,

name: Nusaiba Tasnim
description: Since starting, I have lost 35lbs and gone down from a size 18 to a size 10! My body has completely transformed!
